thread.section_title: ao.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.ao.com
thread.title: simon geddes

author: simon geddes
title: simon geddes
text: I love A.O best deals in town best delivery also my only gripe is the day after placing your order you get a phone call wanting to sell some kind of insurance to protect against breaking down etc at 'x 'amount per month....its a 20 minute plus call even if you don't want to take the cover....But I still use A.O. and still will because of price etc....now then when my products were delivered and un packed the fridge had a 2 year warranty! the oven had a 9 year warranty!!!! when you register the product online with the product manufacturer I have always said no to extended warranties! that companies try and sell you. its just a rip of...BUT that is just my opinion...and maybe not yours.
